attributes.action: propose to The House that each Parliamentary Constituency out-with commuting distance is given a set sum to purchase a Constituency Residence in London.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We propose that the government identify funds to allow for the purchase of a Constituency MP Residence in London that would be the property of that constituency in perpetuity.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
